name: Otherworld: Circuit Puzzles
description:
Improve your mental agility with this free fact action circuit puzzle solving game.

Rotate the tiles to connect the circuit to the battery. Light all the lamps to win but its not so easy as you must solve the circuit before the time runs out. Our free version comes with 9 level of fun, each with a different circuit to solve. Discover what happens when you add more batteries, interlink the wires and introduce crazy self-rotating tiles.
How quickly can you solve the circuits, see how you compare on our leader board.
Circuit Puzzles is a game from Otherworld: Epic Adventure. Complete levels to learn clues about Otherworld: Epic Adventure.

Watch our promo video and find out more about Otherworld: Circuit Puzzles including answers to frequently asked questions by visiting our website:

Be sure to follow us on Facebook for hints, tips, competitions, news and more.

Improve your play with hints and tips to unlock more levels and higher scores. Check out our article (also available from an in-game menu option).

Otherworld: Circuit Puzzles Screenshots:

1. Each level in Otherworld: Circuit Puzzles has its own overview screen displaying the level description, score and number of awards achieved. Hit Play to launch the game and start playing.

2. Every tile on the game screen has part of an electric circuit which lights up when connected to the power. Tiles can be rotated to form connections and the level will be won when they are all lit. The score and the remaining time are shown at the bottom.

3. When only 5 seconds remain on the clock the screen flashes red and the alarm sounds. Move quickly to finish the puzzle before time runs out. At the end of the level the score is calculated, points are award for each second left on the clock, but points are taken away for each move made. You must not only light all tiles, but you must score above 0 to advance to the next level.

4. The main screen presents all the levels as well as the total score and the total number of awards earned. 9 levels are grouped together in a single series and this version includes the entire first series for free. Levels are locked until the one before is completed.

5. If you’ve already completed this free version and want new puzzles, new tiles and more challenge then our Expert Edition is for you! Otherworld: Expert Circuits extends the circuit solving fun with 27 new levels and 5 new tiles. The expert puzzle in this screenshot has multiple batteries and double bulbs which must be powered from 2 directions. All the double bulbs will automatically rotate back to their starting positions after a few seconds, so you must move quickly!

6. Circuit Puzzles is a sub-game from Otherworld: Epic Adventure. Epic Adventure is a Celtic themed murder mystery adventure game using real world photography instead of computer-generated graphics. In this picture is the Otherworld Princess. If you can find her, the Princess knows the most intimate secrets of Otherworld: Epic Adventure.
